mapper.select: select pbi.Repay_Way,pbi.Year_Rate,pbi.Amount,pbi.Deadline, pbi.Deadline_Type ,par.Apply_Id from Project_App_Record par left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID where par.Apply_Id=#{id}

select pbi.Repay_Way,pbi.Year_Rate,pbi.Amount,pbi.Deadline, pbi.Deadline_Type ,pbi.Project_Base_ID,pbi.Project_Title,pbi.Uses,pbi.Repay_Source,pbi.Real_Amount,pbi.Project_Descript from Project_App_Record par left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID where par.Apply_Id=#{id}

select cta.Surplus_Time,cta.Surplus_Time_Type,cta.Surplus_Time_Sub,par.ProEnd_Date, pbi.Repay_Way,pbi.Year_Rate,par.CTA_Id from Creditor_Trans_App cta left join Invest_Record ir on ir.Invest_Id = cta.Invest_Id left join Project_App_Record par on par.Apply_Id = ir.Apply_Id left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID left join Project_App_Process pap on pap.Apply_Id = par.Apply_Id where cta.CTA_Id = #{id}
